panels.title: URLs

queries.query: SELECT referer as "x_axis_1", count(referer) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "apache2_logs"  WHERE referer IS NOT NULL  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 10

panels.title: Geo by Client IPs

queries.query: SELECT geo_city_latitude as latitude, geo_city_longitude as longitude, count(client_ip) as weight FROM "apache2_logs" GROUP BY latitude, longitude

panels.title: Geo by Status

queries.query: SELECT geo_city_latitude as latitude, geo_city_longitude as longitude, count(status) as weight FROM "apache2_logs" GROUP BY latitude, longitude

panels.title: Errors over Geo

queries.query: SELECT geo_city_country_code as "name", count(client_ip) as "value_for_maps" FROM "apache2_logs" WHERE log_file_name IN ('apache_error.log')  GROUP BY name

panels.title: # of events

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "apache2_logs"  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC

panels.title: Compared Analysis for Error Count

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(log_file_name) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "apache2_logs"  WHERE log_file_name IN ('apache_error.log')  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC

panels.title: Pie for Log Types

queries.query: SELECT log_file_name as "x_axis_1", count(log_file_name) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "apache2_logs"  GROUP BY x_axis_1

panels.title: Top 10 clients with errors

queries.query: SELECT client_ip as "x_axis_1", count(log_file_name) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "apache2_logs"  WHERE log_file_name IN ('apache_error.log')  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 10

panels.title: Events by log types

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1", log_file_name as "breakdown_1"  FROM "apache2_logs"  GROUP BY x_axis_1, breakdown_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC LIMIT 10

panels.title: error count

queries.query: SELECT count(log_file_name) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "apache2_logs"  WHERE log_file_name IN ('apache_error.log')

panels.title: client ip count

queries.query: SELECT count(client_ip) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "apache2_logs"  WHERE client_ip IS NOT NULL

panels.title: Count by types

queries.query: SELECT log_file_name as "x_axis_1", count(log_file_name) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "apache2_logs"  WHERE log_file_name IN ('apache_error.log', 'apache_common.log', 'apache_combined.log')  GROUP BY x_axis_1
